summary: AN ORDINANCE modifying, approving and confirming the final assessments and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6750, for the construction of a modern streetcar line serving downtown Seattle, Denny Triangle, and South Lake Union, as provided by Ordinance 121951 as amended by Ordinance 122046, and levying and assessing a part of the cost and expense thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on the final assessment roll.
